name: Moku'ah Village Elder
description: The venerable elder of Moku'ah Village, known for his wisdom and deep knowledge of ancient lore.

start.text: Greetings, traveler. There have been dark whispers coming from the Moku'ah Jungle. Kala the Necromancer is rising again, threatening our village's peace. Would you be brave enough to confront this menace?

acceptQuest.text: Your courage gives us hope. Please, venture into the jungle and put an end to Kala's reign of terror. The fate of Moku'ah rests in your hands.

declineQuest.text: I understand your hesitation. Kala is a formidable foe. Should you change your mind, we will be here, hoping for a hero.

end.text: May the spirits guide you, whatever you decide.

start.text: Have you faced Kala yet? The jungle grows darker with every passing moment. Our village's safety depends on your success.

end.text: Please, do not delay. Every moment counts.

start.text: You have done it! Kala the Necromancer has been defeated. The darkness in the jungle has receded, and the villagers are safe once more.

reward.text: As a token of our gratitude, I present to you the Map to Nyra. This map will unlock the path from Moku'ah Docks to Nyra Beach. May your journey continue with success.

end.text: Thank you, hero. The people of Moku'ah will always remember your bravery.
